text: Cándido Antonio "Chicho" Sibilio Hughes (3 October 1958 – 10 August 2019) was a Dominican-Spanish basketball player. He competed in the men's tournament at the 1980 Summer Olympics. He played for FC Barcelona Bàsquet from 1976 to 1989. Sibilio died on 10 August 2019 in San Gregorio de Nigua, in the southern coast of the Dominican Republic from problems caused by diabetes, aged 60. ==Notes== ==References== ==Other websites== * * * Category:1958 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Basketball coaches Category:Dominican Republic sportspeople Category:Olympians for Spain Category:Small forwards Category:Spanish basketball players
title: Cándido Sibilio
